pullRequest.title: Issue 18068 remove references to load records to index
pullRequest.bodyText:
As the way we run the reindex process changed, the load_records_to_index procedure is not needed anymore, so it is being removed from code
Additionally, an issue on this task Task05205UpdateIndexNameLength was fixed. The upgrade process failed on MSSQL.
Besides, a couple of ITs were implemented to run upgrade tasks

commit.message: #18068 Removing references to load_records_to_index from all databases

nodes.bodyText:
I think we should add here detail about what this task do
for example

remove the load_records_to_index function if it exists
is it possible do a test?, maybe we can run the Task manually and check that the data base have the change that we expect

commit.message: #18068 Fixing issues with upgrade tasks. A couple of ITs were created

nodes.bodyText: Looks like this run on an already altered db. We could put it in the previous state and run the upgrade task to actually test it did the modification.
